Alexandria.Pineapple and Pearls: Pineapple and Pearls is a restaurant on Barracks Row in Washington, D.C, created by chef-owner Aaron Silverman. In 2017 it was named D.C.'s Best Restaurant by Washingtonian (magazine) and a James Beard Foundation Award Semifinalist in the Best New Restaurant Category. The restaurant offers only a tasting menu priced at $280 which include tax, tip, and drink pairings.
